mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT @rownum:= @rownum+1 as rownum, a.* from TBL_GROUNDINFO a,(SELECT @rownum :=0)TMP ORDER by GROUNDNUM) b WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM TBL_USAGSTATUS WHERE GROUNDNUM = #{groundnum} AND RESERVATIONDATE = #{reservationdate}
SELECT WEEKDAYBASICFEE FROM TBL_GROUNDINFO WHERE GROUNDNUM = #{groundnum}
SELECT WEEKENDBASICFEE FROM TBL_GROUNDINFO WHERE GROUNDNUM = #{groundnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_GROUNDINFO (EPUSERID, GROUNDNAME, GROUNDAREA, USERPOSTCODE, USERADDR, USERADDRDETAIL, USERADDRETC, HASHTAG, WEEKDAYBASICFEE, WEEKENDBASICFEE, IMGNAME, IMGREALNAME) VALUES(#{epuserid}, #{groundname}, #{groundarea}, #{userpostcode}, #{useraddr}, #{useraddrdetail}, #{useraddretc}, #{hashTag}, #{weekDayBasicFee}, #{weekEndBasicFee},#{imgname},#{imgrealname})
INSERT INTO TBL_GROUNDHOTTIME (GROUNDNUM, GROUNDWEEK, GROUNDTIME, GROUNDHOTTIMEFEE) VALUES(#{lastid}, 0,#{weekDaytime}, #{weekDayHotTimeFee})
INSERT INTO TBL_GROUNDHOTTIME (GROUNDNUM, GROUNDWEEK, GROUNDTIME,GROUNDHOTTIMEFEE) VALUES(#{lastid}, 1,#{weekEndtime}, #{weekEndHotTimeFee})
INSERT INTO TBL_RESERVATION (USERID, GROUNDTIME, RESERVATIONDATE, RESERVATIONPAY, PAYDATE) VALUES(#{userid},#{reserInfo}, #{select}, #{pay}, NOW())
INSERT INTO TBL_USAGSTATUS (GROUNDNUM, GROUNDTIME, RESERVATIONNUM, RESERVATIONDATE) VALUES(${groundnum},#{groundtime}, #{reservationnum}, #{reservationdate})
